ygData.messageBody:
> >When people ask me to play Jig to increase mana, I use a
> >condensed version of Talies explanation and they usually
> >accept it. If they don't, their problem not mine.
>
> If someone in my group
> asked me to play Jig to speed up their mana (a perceived
> notion mind you) - I will happily do it.


Actually, sometimes I play Jig so that is just LOOKS like their mana is
regenning faster. This way, they get the impression (either consciously or
subconsciously) that downtime is lessened when they group with me, thus
making them want to group with me in the future. =) Plus, what else am I
going to do if they're all healed? :P

Also, some people are impressed with even the illusion that their mana is
regenning faster:

Silly wizard: "Wow, my mana is going up faster - what are you playing?"
Me: "Jig o Vigor. You're really not regenning mana faster overall - you're
just regenning less mana each tick, but the ticks are faster."
Silly wizard: "Wow!!! Cool!!!"

Daleia d'Allaney
